products.name: Work Table
products.shortDescription: Simple work table design with a focus on stability and ease of assembly. Designed to be assembled with glue and brad nails or staples, but can alternatively be screwed together for disassembly
fullDescription: Simple work table design with a focus on stability and ease of construction.
Designed to be assembled with glue and brad nails or staples, but can alternatively be screwed together for disassembly
